videos.description: North Carolina freshman Coby White shakes the Texas defender and knocks down a 3-point shot.
videos.headline: White sizes up defender and nails 3-pointer

videos.description: Texas G Kerwin Roach II  skips a bounce pass to Jaxson Hayes who finishes with a reverse slam.
videos.headline: Roach dimes Hayes for reverse dunk

videos.description: Dylan Osetkowski pump fakes and steps into a 3-ball before the halftime buzzer sounds.
videos.headline: Osetkowski's 3-pointer beats halftime buzzer

videos.description: Kerwin Roach II rises up and throws down an emphatic one-handed slam.
videos.headline: Roach soars for posterizing dunk

videos.description: Coby White knocks down a 3-pointer in transition to close in on the Longhorns' lead.
videos.headline: White shows no hesitation on transition 3-ball
